descriptionHtml:
Description: This mods adds bound weapons & armor
---
Where To Find Bound Weapons:
Bound: Sword - A Merchant Who Sells Master Spells
Bound: Bow - A Merchant Who Sells Master Spells
Bound: BattleAxe - A Merchant Who Sells Master Spells
---
Where To Find Bound Armor:
Bound: Cuirass - A Merchant Who Sells Master Spells
Bound: Gauntlets - A Merchant Who Sells Master Spells
Bound: Boots - A Merchant Who Sells Master Spells
---
Bound Weapon List
---
Bound: Sword
Bound: BattleAxe
Bound: Bow
Bound: Dagger(50% Done)
Bound: GreatSword(0% Done)
Bound: Mace(0% Done)
Bound: WarHammer(0% Done)
Bound: PickAxe(0% Done)
Bound: Wood\'s CutterAxe(0% Done)
---
Bound Armor List
---
Bound: Boots
Bound: Cuirass
Bound: Gauntlets
Bound: Helmet
Bound: Shield
Bound: Knight
Bound: Knight Plus
---
FAQs

author: SkyrimBound6
